Package leikr.transitions

Class EnterTransition

java.lang.Object
leikr.transitions.EnterTransition
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.mini2Dx.core.screen.Transition
public class EnterTransition
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.mini2Dx.core.screen.Transition
Trial class for implementing a custom Transition. This is subject to change or removal in future releases pending any feedback. I liked the idea of a graphical transition to selecting a game and into the loading screen.
